qas.question: When was the Vietnam War fought?
Besides Vietnam, what other countries saw fighting in this war?
What was the name of the strategic bombing of North Vietnam?
When did American military involvement ramp up in Vietnam?
What congressional declaration gave President Johnson authority to send troops to Vietnam?
When was the Chinese War fought?
Besides China, what other countries saw fighting in this war?
What was the name of the bombing of South Korea?
When did American military involvement ramp up in China?
What congressional declaration gave President Johnson authority to send troops to China?

context: The Vietnam War was a war fought <a0_0>between <b5_0>1959 and 1975<b5_0/><a0_0/> on the ground in South Vietnam and bordering areas of <a1_0><b6_0>Cambodia and Laos<b6_0/><a1_0/> (see Secret War) and in the strategic bombing (see <a2_0><b7_0>Operation Rolling Thunder<b7_0/><a2_0/>) of North Vietnam. American advisors came in the late 1950s to help the RVN (Republic of Vietnam) combat Communist insurgents known as "Viet Cong." Major American military involvement began in <a3_0><b8_0>1964<b8_0/><a3_0/>, after Congress provided President Lyndon B. Johnson with blanket approval for presidential use of force in <a4_0>the <b9_0>Gulf of Tonkin Resolution<b9_0/><a4_0/>.
